body:
You are using gccgo, possibly by accident. The name of Go (golang.org) is
golang-go on ubuntu, however that version is quite old, I recommend instead
using the official tarball from the website.

On Sun, May 29, 2016 at 11:07 PM, Jonathan <notifications@github.com> wrote:

>
>    1.
>
>    What version of Go and beego are you using (bee version)?
>    go version xgcc (Ubuntu 4.9.3-0ubuntu4) 4.9.3 linux/amd64
>    2.
>
>    What operating system and processor architecture are you using (go env
>    )?
>
> GOBIN="/root/go_workspace/bin"
> GOCHAR="6"
> GOEXE=""
> GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
> GOHOSTOS="linux"
> GOOS="linux"
> GOPATH="/root/go_workspace"
> GORACE=""
> GOROOT="/usr/local/go"
> GOTOOLDIR="/usr/local/go/lib/gccgo/tool"
> TERM="dumb"
> CC="gcc"
> GOGCCFLAGS="-g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread"
> CXX="g++"
> CGO_ENABLED="1"
>
>
>    1. What did you do?
>
> I try do install packages on Ubuntu.
> go get github.com/astaxie/beego
>
>    1.
>
>    What did you expect to see?
>    Installation success
>    2.
>
>    What did you see instead?
>
> root@ubuntu-512mb-nyc1-01:~/go_workspace# go get github.com/astaxie/beego
> # github.com/astaxie/beego/utils
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/utils/mail.go:405:20 <http://github.com/astaxie/beego/utilssrc/github.com/astaxie/beego/utils/mail.go:405:20>: error: reference to undefined identifier ‘sync.Pool’
>  var bufPool = sync.Pool{
>                     ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/utils/mail.go:405:24: error: expected ‘;’ or newline after top level declaration
>  var bufPool = sync.Pool{
>                         ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/utils/mail.go:408:2: error: expected declaration
>   },
>   ^
> # github.com/astaxie/beego/logs
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:117:17 <http://github.com/astaxie/beego/logssrc/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:117:17>: error: reference to undefined identifier ‘sync.Pool’
>  var logMsgPool *sync.Pool
>                  ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:134:21: error: reference to undefined identifier ‘sync.Pool’
>   logMsgPool = &sync.Pool{
>                      ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:134:25: error: expected ‘;’ or ‘}’ or newline
>   logMsgPool = &sync.Pool{
>                          ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:135:27: error: expected ‘;’ or newline after top level declaration
>    New: func() interface{} {
>                            ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:137:3: error: expected declaration
>    },
>    ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:139:2: error: expected declaration
>   bl.wg.Add(1)
>   ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:140:2: error: expected declaration
>   go bl.startLogger()
>   ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:141:2: error: expected declaration
>   return bl
>   ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:142:1: error: expected declaration
>  }
>  ^
> src/github.com/astaxie/beego/logs/log.go:135:25: error: missing return at end of function
>    New: func() interface{} {
>                          ^
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/15878>, or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe/AAAcA42FMek0PtORjm8L5_n7XwQkkBz5ks5qGY-EgaJpZM4IpSWe>
> .
>
